item.title: Take a look at this code
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

[code]case 12260:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { // by bambam
if(combat >= 100)
{
Selectoption("@dbl@Ready to take the Black Dragon Challenge?", “Oh, I’ve been ready!”, “Im scared, I’m not going.”,"");
OptionObject = objectID;
}
else if(combat <= 100) {
sendMessage(“You need 100 combat to play this mini-game. By BamBam”);
}
}

break;[/code]
any thing wrong?
